name: Push-Up
instructions: Start in a high plank with hands under shoulders.
Lower chest toward floor keeping body straight.
Drive through palms to return to start.
tips: Keep core tight and avoid sagging hips.

name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench, grip bar slightly wider than shoulders.
Lower bar to mid-chest with control.
Press bar up to full arm extension.
tips: Retract scapula and maintain controlled descent.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 30–45° incline.
Press dumbbells up and slightly together.
Lower with control to chest level.
tips: Use full range; avoid flared elbows.

name: Dumbbell Fly
instructions: Lie on flat bench with slight elbow bend.
Open arms wide in an arc until you feel chest stretch.
Bring dumbbells together above chest.
tips: Keep tension on chest; avoid overstretching.
ratingDesc: Isolation for chest shape and stretch.

name: Cable Cross-Over
instructions: Stand in the center of cable station.
Pull handles down and together in front of chest.
Control return to start.
tips: Vary angle to emphasize different chest parts.

name: Decline Bench Press
instructions: Set bench decline; use spotter if heavy.
Lower bar to lower chest area then press up.
Control the eccentric phase.
tips: Focus on controlled motion and stable feet.

name: Chest Dips
instructions: Use parallel bars; lean slightly forward.
Lower until shoulders below elbows.
Push up until arms straight.
tips: Add weight for progression once bodyweight is easy.

name: Incline Push-Up
instructions: Place hands on elevated surface; keep body straight.
Lower chest toward surface, then push up.
Maintain core tension throughout.
tips: Good regression for full push-up strength.
